entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
